decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: Decision to roll out Symbiosis across all circles, with Sudheer in charge of training and implementation support.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: Decision to keep weekly meetings for now, changing the day to Tuesday.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: Decision to launch the circles next week.

recommendations.text: Encourage more balanced participation, as a few speakers dominate the conversation. Use tools like round-robin check-ins or designated speaking times.
Increase question frequency and ensure all questions are addressed to boost overall engagement and response dynamics.
Address explicit knowledge gaps regarding the private equity structure and the detailed functionality of Symbiosis before broader rollout.
Formalize the process for defining and communicating policies, especially for hiring and compensation, to ensure clarity and alignment.
Prioritize the development of a clear SME pitch and a robust internal database of resources and needs to streamline external outreach and internal collaboration.
Monitor interruption rates and actively promote inclusion language to foster a more equitable and welcoming environment.
